title: Process a Full Policy Surrender
description: A whole life policyholder wants to surrender their policy for its cash value.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and explain the consequences of surrendering the policy, including loss of death benefit and potential tax implications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the customer and clearly explains what a surrender means.

tasks.description: Calculate the net cash surrender value after any outstanding loans or surrender charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the final amount the customer will receive.

tasks.description: Process the surrender request and issue the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the surrender and disburses the funds.
